briefdescription.para: Default constructor.

detaileddescription.para: Creates an empty ChemicalEngine instance. Use one of the initialization routines (such as initialize() or initializeFromJsonStrings()) to configure the system.

briefdescription.para: Constructs a ChemicalEngine instance by loading a GEM-Selektor project file.

parameterdescription.para: The file path for the chemical system definition (e.g., "my-system-dat.lst").

briefdescription.para: Destructor.

detaileddescription.para: Cleans up resources. No explicit example is necessary.

briefdescription.para: Deleted copy constructor.
Deleted assignment operator.
Reallocates internal arrays.

detaileddescription.para: Should be invoked after the system composition changes to ensure proper memory configuration.

briefdescription.para: Initializes the ChemicalEngine from a GEM-Selektor project file.

detaileddescription.para: Reads the file and configures the chemical system defined inside it.

parameterdescription.para: Path to the system definition file (e.g., "my-system-dat.lst").

memberdef.argsstring: (std::string dch_json, std::string ipm_json, std::string dbr_json) -> void
memberdef.name: initializeFromJsonStrings

briefdescription.para: Initializes the ChemicalEngine using JSON strings.

detaileddescription.para:
Configures the engine from three JSON strings:
dch_json: Defines the chemical system.
ipm_json: Contains calculation parameters and settings.
dbr_json: Specifies the input node composition.

parameterdescription.para: JSON string describing the chemical system.
JSON string with parameter and algorithm settings.
JSON string containing node composition details.

briefdescription.para: Reads a DBR file from disk.

detaileddescription.para: Loads system composition and parameter data from a DBR file.

parameterdescription.para: Path to the input DBR file (e.g., "input.dbr").

briefdescription.para: Reads System DBR composition from a JSON string.

detaileddescription.para: Updates the system composition using JSON information.

parameterdescription.para: JSON string containing DBR composition data.

briefdescription.para: Writes the current DBR to a file.

detaileddescription.para: Saves the state of the system (after equilibrium calculations) into a DBR file.

parameterdescription.para: Path to the output DBR file (e.g., "output.dbr").

briefdescription.para: Returns the current DBR as a JSON string.

simplesect.para: A JSON string representing the system composition.

briefdescription.para: Returns the number of elements in the system.
Returns the number of species in the system.
Returns the number of phases in the system.
Returns the number of species in a given phase.

simplesect.para: (Index) Number of species in that phase.

briefdescription.para: Returns the name of an element.
Returns the name of a species.
Returns the electrical charge of a species.
Returns the name of the phase.
Returns the index of an element by name.

simplesect.para: (Index) Index of the element (or total elements if not found).

briefdescription.para: Returns the index of a species by name.

simplesect.para: (Index) Index of the species (or total species if not found).

briefdescription.para: Returns all indices of species matching the specified name.
Returns the index of a phase by name.
Returns all indices for phases that match the given name.

simplesect.para: (VectorXi) Vector of indices for matching phases.

briefdescription.para: Returns the index of the phase containing a given species.

simplesect.para: (Index) Index of the phase that contains the species.

briefdescription.para: Returns the index of the first species in a specified phase.

simplesect.para: (Index) Index of the first species in that phase.

briefdescription.para: Returns molar masses of elements.

simplesect.para: (VectorConstRef) Vector of molar masses (kg/mol) for each element.

briefdescription.para: Returns molar masses of species.
Returns the formula matrix (elements x species).

simplesect.para: (MatrixConstRef) Formula matrix where rows correspond to elements and columns correspond to species.

briefdescription.para: Sets the complete species amounts vector.
Sets the amount for a species identified by name.
Sets the amount for a species identified by its index.
Sets the options for the ChemicalEngine.
Configures the engine to use a warm (smart) start.

detaileddescription.para: Uses previous equilibrium as initial guess (faster convergence).

briefdescription.para: Configures the engine to use a cold start.

detaileddescription.para: Uses a simplex LP initial guess (slower but may yield more accurate results).

briefdescription.para: Sets an upper bound for a species identified by name.
Sets a lower bound for a species identified by name.
Sets an upper bound for a species identified by its index.
Sets a lower bound for a species identified by its index.
Sets the standard molar Gibbs energy for a species.

parameterdescription.para: (double) Standard molar Gibbs energy in J/mol.

briefdescription.para: Sets upper limits for all species.

parameterdescription.para: (VectorConstRef) Vector of upper limits in mol.

briefdescription.para: Sets lower limits for all species.

parameterdescription.para: (VectorConstRef) Vector of lower limits in mol.

briefdescription.para: Sets the pressure and temperature without computing equilibrium.

simplesect.para: (bool) False if PT was set correctly, true if out of range.

briefdescription.para: Sets the amounts of elements (vector b) without computing equilibrium.

parameterdescription.para: (VectorConstRef) Vector of element amounts in mol.

briefdescription.para: Re-equilibrates the system with (or without) a warm start.

parameterdescription.para: (bool) If true, uses previous data as an initial guess.

memberdef.argsstring: (double T, double P, VectorConstRef b) -> int
memberdef.name: equilibrate

briefdescription.para: Computes the equilibrium state.

detaileddescription.para: Uses temperature (K), pressure (Pa), and element amounts (in mol) to compute equilibrium.

simplesect.para: (int) Return code of the equilibrium solver.

briefdescription.para: Checks if the equilibrium calculation converged.
Returns the number of iterations performed during equilibrium.
Returns the elapsed time of the equilibrium computation.
Returns the current temperature of the system.
Returns the current pressure of the system.
Returns the amounts of the elements.

simplesect.para: (VectorConstRef) Vector of element amounts in mol.

briefdescription.para: Returns the amounts of the species.

simplesect.para: (VectorConstRef) Vector of species amounts in mol.

briefdescription.para: Returns the amount of a species by index.
Returns the amount of a species identified by name.
Returns the upper limits for all species.

simplesect.para: (VectorConstRef) Vector of upper limits in mol.

briefdescription.para: Returns the lower limits for all species.

simplesect.para: (VectorConstRef) Vector of lower limits in mol.

briefdescription.para: Returns the molalities of the species.

detaileddescription.para: Assumes the aqueous phase is the first phase.

briefdescription.para: Returns the mole fractions of the species.
Returns the ln activity coefficients of the species (mole fraction scale).
Returns the ln activities of the species.
Returns the ln of species concentrations.
Returns the chemical potentials of the species.
Returns the standard molar Gibbs energy of a species.

simplesect.para: (double) Standard molar Gibbs energy in J/mol.

Returns the standard molar volume of a species.
Returns the standard molar entropy of a species.
Returns the standard molar isobaric heat capacity of a species.

Returns the specific enthalpy of a phase.

Returns the specific entropy of a phase.
Returns the specific isobaric heat capacity of a phase.
Returns the densities of all phases.
Returns the density of a specified phase.
Returns the masses of all phases.
Returns the mass of a specified phase.

briefdescription.para: Returns the molar amount of a specific phase.
Returns the volumes of all phases.

briefdescription.para: Returns the heat capacity of a specified phase.
Returns the saturation indices of all phases (log units).
Returns the saturation index of a specific phase (log units).
Returns the total mass of the system.
Returns the total volume of the system.
Returns the ionic strength of the aqueous phase.
Returns the pH of the aqueous phase.
Returns the pe of the aqueous phase.

Returns the total Gibbs energy of the system.
Returns the total enthalpy of the system.
Returns the total entropy of the system.
Returns the total isobaric heat capacity of the system.
Class for equilibrium computations and thermodynamic analysis.

detaileddescription.para: The ChemicalEngine performs Gibbs energy minimization to compute the equilibrium state of a chemical system. Its API provides methods to load system data, update component amounts, set options, and query resulting thermodynamic properties.
